text: Nde guigira Zisas khothɨgap ana zɨn vui gumgi gu mbigi, gu ntigem za gumgi wari won tɨvi, ga suan zav mbui. Nza maaŋ muuŋgip, nzan guma phunini, mani maaŋ muuŋgip, wani tɨgɨp kama shogip, buna thueŋ suaŋgirga. Mani mba suaŋgi kameŋ, ne mani suaŋgi kameŋ ma. Harigi guma the harigi buna thuen mani suaŋgi kameŋ ga phevarga tuktɨgi fhuvara. Harigi guma the khaŋ suanga fhu, “Nza mba mani suaŋgi kameŋ zɨn ŋgɨrga fhu.”
